title: Number of Ways to Stay in the Same Place After Some Steps
content:
You have a pointer at index 0 in an array of size . At each step, you can move 1 position to the left, 1 position to the right in the array or stay in the same place  (The pointer should not be placed outside the array at any time).
Given two integers  and , return the number of ways such that your pointer still at index 0 after exactly  steps.
Since the answer may be too large, return it modulo .
